alert.note: Alert for Converse; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 7:13PM MDT until July 08 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... East central Converse County in east central Wyoming... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 713 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles east of Douglas, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Glendo around 740 PM MDT. Glendo Reservoir around 745 PM MDT. Two Moon Campground and Sibley Peak around 750 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 105 and 128. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
